text: 2.8: Mt 26.39; 26.42; Zo 10.17-18; Ro 8.3; Hi 5.8; 12.2Kha gumgi ana garim, ana guma guara gegap ki. Ana kav, ana guigira wo mbevav, ana Fhe Bakɨme nzuai buni zɨn vov kav, ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme vuzvuga zɨn vov, rimgi. Ahaŋ, ana mbara muuŋgiap, ana vuzvuga zɨn vov, kav, mbe ana ndim, khanarareŋ ga ntorgim, ana rimgi.
